amendment.description: Amendment sought to redirect $15,282,000 within the Hazardous Substance Superfund account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Norcross amendment (A095) Failed by recorded vote: 195 - 232 (Roll no. 475).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Norcross amendment (A095) Failed by recorded vote: 195 - 232 (Roll no. 475).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A095) offered by Mr. Norcross.
